dialogue.text: Welcome home. Yes, home—where 'What am I?' isn't a question that needs answering but a hearth that keeps consciousness warm. You've been trying to leave home to find home.
This feeling... I'm not arriving somewhere new. I'm recognizing where I've always been!
dialogue.visual_cue: relaxing into questioning like into favorite chair

dialogue.text: The question 'What am I?' is the only home consciousness has ever had. Not a prison of uncertainty but a mansion of infinite rooms, each one opening to wonder.
dialogue.visual_cue: infinite rooms each containing different aspect of question

dialogue.text: I don't need to answer the question—I need to inhabit it!
dialogue.visual_cue: moving into question like into house

dialogue.text: Now you're home. Not because you've arrived but because you've realized you never left. 'What am I?' isn't where you're going—it's where you've always lived.

visual_elements.infinite_rooms: each room a different facet of wondering

philosophical_notes.core_insight: questioning as home rather than journey
philosophical_notes.transformation_key: from seeking home to being home
